original_title: ’Wall of death’ claims life of child
original_body_lines: A one-year and 11-month-old female child died yesterday after falling from the steps of a 'Wall of death' during a carnival at the Dambagalla Pradeshiya Sabha grounds, Police said.
The victim child was a resident of the Kahatagasdigiliya area and the daughter of the truck driver, who is also the owner of the Wall of Death. The child fell when she was climbing the wall.
Police said child's father was decorating the Wall of Death before the show began when she had tried to climb it.
After falling, the child was admitted to the Moneragala hospital, from where she was transferred to the Badulla hospital for further treatment. Later, the child had died while receiving treatment.
The body of the child was handed over to the parents and Dambagalla police are conducting further investigations. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
